highlights.headline: Carolina Hurricanes vs. Boston Bruins: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Carolina Hurricanes vs. Boston Bruins: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Carolina Hurricanes vs. Boston Bruins: Game Highlights) 2025/11/18 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Jordan Staal outmuscled a Boston defenseman for a goal with one arm, Pyotr Kochetkov stopped 29 shots and the Carolina Hurricanes cooled off the hot Bruins for a 3-1 victory on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pyotr Kochetkov makes 29 saves as Hurricanes beat Bruins 3-1

video.headline: Carolina Hurricanes vs. Boston Bruins: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Carolina Hurricanes vs. Boston Bruins: Game Highlights) 2025/11/18 ESHEET

highlights.headline: Edmonton Oilers vs. Buffalo Sabres: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Edmonton Oilers vs. Buffalo Sabres: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Edmonton Oilers vs. Buffalo Sabres: Game Highlights) 2025/11/18 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Rookie center Noah Ostlund scored twice for his first multigoal game in the NHL, and the Buffalo Sabres beat the Edmonton Oilers 5-1 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ostlund scores twice as Sabres top Oilers 5-1

video.headline: Edmonton Oilers vs. Buffalo Sabres: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Edmonton Oilers vs. Buffalo Sabres: Game Highlights) 2025/11/18 ESHEET

highlights.description: Vancouver Canucks vs. Florida Panthers: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Vancouver Canucks vs. Florida Panthers: Game Highlights) 2025/11/18 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Sam Bennett scored the tiebreaking goal at 4:02 of the third period and the Florida Panthers beat the Vancouver Canucks 8-5 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bennett keys Panthers' three-goal third period in 8-5 win over Canucks

video.headline: Vancouver Canucks vs. Florida Panthers: Game Highlights

headlines.description: — Alex Ovechkin scored his 903rd career NHL goal and the Washington Capitals beat the Los Angeles Kings 2-1 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ovechkin scores 903rd career goal as Capitals edge Kings 2-1

headlines.description: — Kirill Marchenko scored the deciding goal of the shootout, and the Columbus Blue Jackets beat the Montreal Canadiens 4-3 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Marchenko gets deciding goal of shootout to give Blue Jackets 4-3 win over Canadiens

highlights.headline: Utah Mammoth vs. Anaheim Ducks: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Utah Mammoth vs. Anaheim Ducks: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Utah Mammoth vs. Anaheim Ducks: Game Highlights) 2025/11/18 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Olen Zellweger scored 1:50 into overtime after Troy Terry tied it with 4.1 seconds left in regulation, and the Anaheim Ducks dramatically snapped their three-game skid with a 3-2 victory over the Utah Mammoth on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Olen Zellweger scores OT winner after Troy Terry's last-gasp tying goal in Ducks' 3-2 win over Utah

video.headline: Utah Mammoth vs. Anaheim Ducks: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Utah Mammoth vs. Anaheim Ducks: Game Highlights) 2025/11/18 ESHEET
